section.title: cash receipts miscellaneous distribution for Misc. Cash Receipt Distribution
section.para: To add a miscellaneous distribution, select the ADD button. The following screen will appear:
When adding a miscellaneous distribution, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select an Account for the miscellaneous distribution.
Specify the amount to distribute to/from the specified Account.
This is a scrolling text field with word-wrapping for entering Notes related to the miscellaneous distribution.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without applying a miscellaneous distribution, returning you to the application desktop.

note.para: If your system is configured to use Credit Cards, the "Credit Card" tab will be visible. This tab will not be visible if your system is not configured to use Credit Cards.
